member.name: T:My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:DPTechnology.AnnexLibraries.AddInRegistrationUtilities
member.summary: Provides utility procedures related to managing the required registry keys for exposing and loading ESPRIT Add-Ins.

member.name: F:DPTechnology.AnnexLibraries.AddInRegistrationUtilities.EspritAddInsKeyName
member.summary: Gets the name of the LocalMachine registry key used to register ESPRIT Add-Ins.

member.name: M:DPTechnology.AnnexLibraries.AddInRegistrationUtilities.EspritAddInIsRegistered(System.String)
member.summary: Checks to see whether or not an add-in with the given name is currently registered as an ESPRIT Add-In.
member.param: The ProgId of the add-in to check for, as given by its ProgIdAttribute.
member.returns: True if the add-in is registered.

member.name: M:DPTechnology.AnnexLibraries.AddInRegistrationUtilities.EspritAddInIsRegistered(System.String,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Checks to see whether or not an add-in with the given name is currently registered as an ESPRIT Add-In.
member.param: The ProgId of the add-in to check for, as given by its ProgIdAttribute.
A Boolean to indicate whether or not the add-in was registered as an automatically loading extensions.
member.returns: True if the add-in is registered.
member.remarks: This is a Friend function so as to not be accessible from compiled assembly DLL.

member.name: M:DPTechnology.AnnexLibraries.AddInRegistrationUtilities.GetEspritAddInLoadBehavior(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the LoadBehavior value of the ESPRIT add-in with the given name.
member.param: The ProgId of the add-in to check for, as given by its ProgIdAttribute.

member.name: M:DPTechnology.AnnexLibraries.AddInRegistrationUtilities.SetEspritAddInLoadOnStartup(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the LoadBehavior value of the ESPRIT add-in with the given name.
member.param: The ProgId of the add-in to check for, as given by its ProgIdAttribute.
Pass True if the add-in is to load upon ESPRIT startup, False if it is to remain unloaded. True is the default if omitted.
member.remarks: An add-in that is unloaded at startup can still be manual loaded by the user via the Add-In Manager dialog accessed under Tools > Add-In... on the ESPRIT menu.

member.name: M:DPTechnology.AnnexLibraries.AddInRegistrationUtilities.RegisterEspritAddInById(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates the necessary registry entries to register an application as an ESPRIT Add-In.
member.param: The ProgId of the add-in to register, as given by its ProgIdAttribute.

The friendly name used to refer to this add-in. This is the name that will appear in the "Available Add-Ins" column of the Add-In Manager dialog accessed under Tools > Add-In... on the ESPRIT menu. If FriendlyName is omitted then the AddIn ProgId will be used instead.
The detailed description of this add-in that will appear in the Description frame when this add-in is selected on the Add-In Manager dialog accessed under Tools > Add-In... on the ESPRIT menu.
Whether or not this add-in should load on ESPRIT startup by default. 0 = Do not Load on Startup; 1 = Load on Startup (which is the default if omitted).
member.returns: True if the application was successfully registered; False if an error was thrown that prevented registration.

member.name: M:DPTechnology.AnnexLibraries.AddInRegistrationUtilities.RegisterEspritAddIn(System.Type,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Validates an ESPRIT Add-In Class and adds the necessary ESPRIT registry entries for it.
member.param: The System.Type of add-in Class to register (the Class that Implements Extensibility.IDTExtensibility2).

The friendly name used to refer to this add-in. This is the name that will appear in the "Available Add-Ins" column of the Add-In Manager dialog accessed under Tools > Add-In... on the ESPRIT menu. If FriendlyName is omitted then the AddIn ProgId will be used instead.
The detailed description of this add-in that will appear in the Description frame when this add-in is selected on the Add-In Manager dialog accessed under Tools > Add-In... on the ESPRIT menu.
Whether or not this add-in should load on ESPRIT startup by default. 0 = Do not Load on Startup; 1 = Load on Startup (which is the default if omitted).
member.returns: True if the application was successfully registered; False if an error was thrown that prevented registration.

member.name: M:DPTechnology.AnnexLibraries.AddInRegistrationUtilities.UnregisterEspritAddInById(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the registry entries for an ESPRIT Add-In that were created with
member.param: The ProgId of the add-in to unregister, as given by its ProgIdAttribute.
member.returns: True if the add-in is no longer registered.

member.name: M:DPTechnology.AnnexLibraries.AddInRegistrationUtilities.UnregisterEspritAddIn(System.Type)
member.summary: Removes the registry entries for an ESPRIT Add-In that were created with
member.param: The System.Type of add-in Class to unregister (the Class that Implements Extensibility.IDTExtensibility2).
member.returns: True if the add-in is no longer registered.

member.name: M:DPTechnology.AnnexLibraries.AddInRegistrationUtilities.TryGetProgId(System.Type,System.String@)
member.summary: Finds the ProgIdAttribute value of the given Class.
member.param: The System.Type of the Class to get the ProgId for.
A return value giving the ProgIdAttribute.
member.returns: True if a ProgIdAttribute value was successfully found; False otherwise
member.remarks: This function does not perform any other Class validation; for complete validation use

member.name: M:DPTechnology.AnnexLibraries.AddInRegistrationUtilities.ValidateAddIn(System.Type,System.String@)
member.summary: Validates the given add-in Class and returns the corresponding ProgId needed to register the add-in with ESPRIT.
member.param: The System.Type of add-in Class that Implements Extensibility.IDTExtensibility2.
A return value giving the ProgIdAttribute if the Class is valid for an ESPRIT Add-In.
member.returns: True if the Class is valid for an ESPRIT Add-In; False otherwise
member.exception: if the given Class type does not have the attributes required to be a valid ESPRIT add-in.

member.name: M:DPTechnology.AnnexLibraries.AddInRegistrationUtilities.GetFullyQualifiedName(System.Type)
member.summary: Returns the FullyQualifiedName needed to register the add-in corresponding to the given class.
member.param: The System.Type of add-in Class that Implements Extensibility.IDTExtensibility2.
member.exception: If the ProgID from the Attributes of the given Class type does not match the AssemblyName and ExportedType found from the GUID Attributes of that Class type.
member.remarks: This Function is only meant for use from within the Class module of an add-in that Implements Extensibility.IDTExtensibility2. If the name of said Class is Connect, for example, then typical usage would be: GetFullyQualifiedName(GetType(Connect)) and the string returned would be passed as the AddInName to the procedure.

member.name: M:DPTechnology.AnnexLibraries.AddInRegistrationUtilities.RegisterEspritAddIn(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates the necessary registry entries to register an application as an ESPRIT Add-In.
member.param: The ProgId of the add-in to register, as given by its ProgIdAttribute.

The friendly name used to refer to this add-in. This is the name that will appear in the "Available Add-Ins" column of the Add-In Manager dialog accessed under Tools > Add-In... on the ESPRIT menu. If FriendlyName is omitted then the AddIn ProgId will be used instead.
The detailed description of this add-in that will appear in the Description frame when this add-in is selected on the Add-In Manager dialog accessed under Tools > Add-In... on the ESPRIT menu.
Whether or not this add-in should load on ESPRIT startup by default. 0 = Do not Load on Startup; 1 = Load on Startup (which is the default if omitted).
member.returns: True if the application was successfully registered; False if an error was thrown that prevented registration.

member.name: M:DPTechnology.AnnexLibraries.AddInRegistrationUtilities.UnregisterEspritAddIn(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the registry entries for an ESPRIT Add-In that were created with
member.param: The ProgId of the add-in to unregister, as given by its ProgIdAttribute.
member.returns: True if the add-in is no longer registered.

member.name: T:DPTechnology.AnnexLibraries.IConnectionManager
member.summary: An interface for defining a manager for ESPRIT Add-In connections.

member.name: T:DPTechnology.AnnexLibraries.IEspritAddIn
member.summary: An interface for defining the basic set of properties needed for a self-registering ESPRIT Add-In.

member.name: T:DPTechnology.AnnexLibraries.EspritAddIn
member.summary: The base class that defines the basic set of properties and functionality needed for a self-registering ESPRIT Add-In.

member.name: P:DPTechnology.AnnexLibraries.EspritAddIn.PreviousLanguage
member.summary: The previous Language in ESPRIT under which the AddIn was run; used by routine.
member.remarks: Returns Nothing the first time an Add-In connects (to indicate PreviousLanguage unknown). Implemented As Int32 rather than EspritConstants.espLanguage to eliminate dependency on EspritConstants library.

member.name: M:DPTechnology.AnnexLibraries.EspritAddIn.LocalizeRegistration
member.summary: Localizes the registration for an Add-In so that the description and friendly name are displayed in the appropriate language on the Tools > Add-In dialog in ESPRIT.
member.remarks: Because initial RegisterFunction must be declared Shared, it cannot access instance members FriendlyName, Description, and LoadBehavior. LocalizeRegistration must be called after the add-in connects to record those values to registry.

member.name: M:DPTechnology.AnnexLibraries.EspritAddIn.RegisterFunction(System.Type)
member.summary: Automatically registers an ESPRIT Add-In at compile time.

member.name: M:DPTechnology.AnnexLibraries.EspritAddIn.UnregisterFunction(System.Type)
member.summary: Automatically unregisters an ESPRIT Add-In.

member.name: M:DPTechnology.AnnexLibraries.EspritAddIn.GetMinMaxEnumValues``1
member.remarks: Copied from UtilityAnnex.EnumerationUtilites so as to not have dependency on UtilityAnnex.

member.name: T:DPTechnology.AnnexLibraries.EspritAssemblyResolver
member.summary: A class that can automatically resolve references to DLL libraries that do not reside in the same local folder as the current application.

member.name: M:DPTechnology.AnnexLibraries.EspritAssemblyResolver.#ctor(System.AppDomain)
member.summary: Creates a new EspritAssemblyResolver that actively tries to resolve missing references to ESPRIT DLL Type Libraries as they are needed.
member.param: The System.AppDomain in which to listen for the AssemblyResolve event. Typically AppDomain.CurrentDomain should be passed for this argument.
member.remarks: Typical Usage: Private espritAssemblyResolver As New EspritAssemblyResolver(AppDomain.CurrentDomain)

member.name: M:DPTechnology.AnnexLibraries.EspritAssemblyResolver.#ctor(System.AppDomain,Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.Log)
member.summary: Creates a new EspritAssemblyResolver that actively tries to resolve missing references to ESPRIT DLL Type Libraries as they are needed.
member.param: The System.AppDomain in which to listen for the AssemblyResolve event. Typically AppDomain.CurrentDomain should be passed for this argument.
The application Log in which to note results, both success and failure.
member.remarks: Typical Usage: Private espritAssemblyResolver As New EspritAssemblyResolver(AppDomain.CurrentDomain, My.Application.Log)

member.name: M:DPTechnology.AnnexLibraries.EspritAssemblyResolver.GetInstallPath
member.summary: Returns the ESPRIT installation path for the most recently installed ESPRIT version as stored in the Windows Registry.
member.returns: A string indicating the ESPRIT installation path.
member.exception: If unable to find or read the appropriate Windows Registry key.

member.name: M:DPTechnology.AnnexLibraries.EspritAssemblyResolver.GetEspritProgFolder
member.summary: Returns the path of the Prog folder under the ESPRIT installation.
member.remarks: The returned path is NOT terminated with the directory separator character.

member.name: M:DPTechnology.AnnexLibraries.EspritAssemblyResolver.TryGetAssemblyPath(System.String,System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Tries to get the path to an Assembly given the Assembly name (in short form).
member.param: The name of the Assembly, typically as extracted from the first field passed via the args.Name property of the args argument to the AssemblyResolve event.
The folder path in which to search for the DLL.
An return value giving the path of the DLL, if found.

member.name: M:DPTechnology.AnnexLibraries.EspritAssemblyResolver.TryResolveReference(System.String,System.String,System.Reflection.Assembly@,System.String@)
member.summary: Tries to resolve a Reference by searching in the given folder for the DLL corresponding to the given full Assembly name and loading it.
member.param: The full name of the Assembly, typically as passed via the args.Name property of the args argument to the AssemblyResolve event.
The folder path in which to search for the DLL.
A return value giving the Assembly loaded, if found.
An optional return value giving the path of the DLL loaded.
member.remarks: This is a generic function for resolving any reference, including non-ESPRIT references.

member.name: M:DPTechnology.AnnexLibraries.EspritAssemblyResolver.TryResolveReference(System.String,System.Reflection.Assembly@,System.String@)
member.summary: A private function specifically for dealing with ESPRIT and AnnexLibrary references; called by the Public and functions.

member.name: M:DPTechnology.AnnexLibraries.EspritAssemblyResolver.TryResolveEspritReference(System.String,System.Reflection.Assembly@,System.String@)
member.summary: Tries to resolve a Reference to an ESPRIT API Type Library by looking in the Esprit\Prog\ folder for the DLL corresponding to the given full Assembly name and loading it.
member.param: The name of the Assembly, typically as extracted from the first field passed via the args.Name property of the args argument to the AssemblyResolve event.
A return value giving the Assembly loaded, if found.
An optional return value giving the path of the DLL loaded.

member.name: M:DPTechnology.AnnexLibraries.EspritAssemblyResolver.TryResolveAnnexLibraryReference(System.String,System.Reflection.Assembly@,System.String@)
member.summary: Tries to resolve a Reference to an ESPRIT AnnexLibrary by looking in the D.P.Technology\AnnexLibraries folder under the CommonProgramFiles path for the DLL corresponding to the given full Assembly name and loading it.
member.param: The name of the Assembly, typically as extracted from the first field passed via the args.Name property of the args argument to the AssemblyResolve event.
A return value giving the Assembly loaded, if found.
An optional return value giving the path of the DLL loaded.
